item.name: Abyssal Nightstalker
item.text: Whenever Abyssal Nightstalker attacks and isn't blocked, defending player discards a card.

item.name: Air Elemental
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.

item.name: Alaborn Cavalier
item.text: Whenever Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may tap target creature.
item.flavorText: "Course he ran I wouldn't want to stare down that barrel, either" —Alaborn soldier

item.name: Alaborn Grenadier
item.text: Vigilance
item.flavorText: "Ever proud, ever vigilant." —Grenadier motto

item.name: Alaborn Musketeer
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: Muskets gave the Alaborn army an advantage it had long lacked—air defense.

item.name: Alaborn Trooper
item.flavorText: "I dedicate my body to my country And my life to my King." —Alaborn Soldier's Oath

item.name: Alaborn Veteran
item.text: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

item.name: Alaborn Zealot
item.text: When Alaborn Zealot blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Alaborn Zealot.

item.name: Alluring Scent
item.text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
item.flavorText: No earthly armor is protection against this sweetness.

item.name: Alluring Scent
item.text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
item.flavorText: No earthly armor is protection against this sweetness.

item.name: Ancient Craving
item.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
item.flavorText: "Knowledge demands sacrifice." —Tojira, swamp queen

item.name: Angel of Fury
item.text: Flying When Angel of Fury is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may shuffle it into your library.

item.name: Angel of Mercy
item.text: Flying When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

item.name: Angelic Blessing
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: The man who rose up to fight was not the same man knocked down.

item.name: Angelic Blessing
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: The man who rose up to fight was not the same man knocked down.

item.name: Angelic Wall
item.text: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: Be at peace, and observe its beauty. Be at war, and feel its justice.

item.name: Apprentice Sorcerer
item.text: {T}: Apprentice Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

item.name: Archangel
item.text: Flying, vigilance

item.name: Archangel
item.text: Flying, vigilance

item.name: Armageddon
item.text: Destroy all lands.
item.flavorText: War destroys more than just the land. War destroys hope.

item.name: Armageddon
item.text: Destroy all lands.
item.flavorText: War destroys more than just the land. War destroys hope.

item.name: Armored Galleon
item.text: Armored Galleon can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
item.flavorText: "Information equals profits. Our merchants sell it, or our pirates use it." —Jefan, Talas ship captain

item.name: Armored Griffin
item.text: Flying, vigilance

item.name: Barbtooth Wurm
item.flavorText: In its lair lies a carpet of bones.

item.name: Bargain
item.text: Target opponent draws a card. You gain 7 life.
item.flavorText: Bargaining with a goblin is like trading with a child; both believe they already own everything.

item.name: Bear Cub
item.flavorText: Every little cub has its mother's teeth to guard it. —Elvish saying

item.name: Bee Sting
item.text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Busy as a bumblebee, blistered as a goblin. —Alaborn saying

item.name: Bee Sting
item.text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Busy as a bumblebee, blistered as a goblin. —Alaborn saying

item.name: Blaze
item.text: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "This isn't what I meant by ‘facing the heat of battle'" —Jefan, Talas ship captain

item.name: Blaze
item.text: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "This isn't what I meant by ‘facing the heat of battle'" —Jefan, Talas ship captain

item.name: Bloodcurdling Scream
item.text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I have all the weapons my enemies have—and far deeper rage." —Tojira, swamp queen

item.name: Breath of Life
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.name: Breath of Life
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.name: Brimstone Dragon
item.text: Flying, haste

item.name: Brutal Nightstalker
item.text: When Brutal Nightstalker enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

item.name: Chorus of Woe
item.text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: When nightstalkers sing, nothing in creation sleeps.

item.name: Coastal Wizard
item.text: {T}: Return Coastal Wizard and another target creature to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

item.name: Coercion
item.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
item.flavorText: "Human tenderness is simply weakness in a pretty package." —Tojira, swamp queen

item.name: Cruel Edict
item.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
item.flavorText: "Such a fragile organ, the brain." —Tojira, swamp queen

item.name: Cunning Giant
item.text: If Cunning Giant is unblocked, you may have it assign its combat damage to a creature defending player controls.

item.name: Dakmor Bat
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: The bat thrives on what underestimates it.

item.name: Dakmor Plague
item.text: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
item.flavorText: The tiniest cough can be deadlier than the fiercest dragon.

item.name: Dakmor Scorpion
item.flavorText: A scorpion this big you won't find curled up in your boot. Maybe around your boot, but not in it.

item.name: Dakmor Sorceress
item.text: Dakmor Sorceress's power is equal to the number of Swamps you control.

item.name: Dark Offering
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
item.flavorText: "Our greatest hope has become our enemy's greatest triumph." —Restela, Alaborn marshal

item.name: Deathcoil Wurm
item.text: You may have Deathcoil Wurm assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

item.name: Deep Wood
item.text: Cast Deep Wood only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

item.name: Deep Wood
item.text: Cast Deep Wood only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

item.text: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: History is the study of repetition.

item.text: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: History is the study of repetition.

item.name: Denizen of the Deep
item.text: When Denizen of the Deep enters the battlefield, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.

item.name: Earthquake
item.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

item.text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

item.text: Counter target creature spell.

item.name: Goblin Cavaliers
item.flavorText: They get along so well with their goats because they're practically goats themselves.

item.name: Goblin Firestarter
item.text: Sacrifice Goblin Firestarter: Goblin Firestarter deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

item.name: Goblin General
item.text: Whenever Goblin General attacks, Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Lead, follow, or run around like crazy.

item.name: Goblin Glider
item.text: Flying Goblin Glider can't block.
item.flavorText: The goblins call the gliders "death from above." Everyone else calls them "clods in the clouds."

item.name: Goblin Lore
item.text: Draw four cards, then discard three cards at random.
item.flavorText: "I done forgot more than you'll ever know, pipsqueak." "Yeah—that's your problem."

item.name: Goblin Matron
item.text: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

item.name: Goblin Mountaineer
item.text: Mountainwalk
item.flavorText: Goblin mountaineer, barely keeps his family fed.

item.name: Goblin Piker
item.flavorText: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

item.name: Goblin Raider
item.text: Goblin Raider can't block.
item.flavorText: "I seen lots o' fights. To win ya gotta bash hard and not get bashed back." —Goblin grunt

item.name: Goblin War Cry
item.text: Target opponent chooses a creature he or she controls. Other creatures he or she controls can't block this turn.
item.flavorText: "Goblins cry, soldiers fly. Stones fly, soldiers die"

item.name: Goblin War Strike
item.text: Goblin War Strike deals damage equal to the number of Goblins you control to target player.

item.name: Golden Bear
item.flavorText: The elvish scout was scrupulous about the truth. She told the traders that gold lay nearby.

item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
item.flavorText: The touch of death is never gentle.

item.flavorText: "Every seed planted is another lesson the forest can teach us." —Arathel, elvish queen

item.text: Nightstalker Engine's power is equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
item.flavorText: Part metal, part bone, and all death.

item.name: Norwood Archers
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: "‘Air superiority?' Not while our archers scan the skies." —Elvish scout

item.name: Norwood Priestess
item.text: {T}: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

item.name: Norwood Ranger
item.flavorText: Some trees bear deadly fruit.

item.name: Norwood Riders
item.text: Norwood Riders can't be blocked by more than one creature.
item.flavorText: "Trade my moose? Sure—when I find a horse that can spear ten goblins at a time"

item.name: Norwood Warrior
item.text: Whenever Norwood Warrior becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The woods hold peace for those who desire it, but those who seek battle will find me."

item.name: Obsidian Giant
item.flavorText: After a while, ships stopped sailing within his reach.

item.name: Ogre Arsonist
item.text: When Ogre Arsonist enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

item.name: Ogre Berserker
item.text: Haste
item.flavorText: The machine does the growling, so the ogre's free to smile.

item.name: Ogre Taskmaster
item.text: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.
item.flavorText: Three little goblins, enjoying their brew. One bumped an ogre, and then there were two.

item.name: Ogre Warrior
item.flavorText: Assault and battery included.

item.text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
item.flavorText: "You could die famous or you could die old. I chose old." —Former soldier

item.text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
item.flavorText: "You could die famous or you could die old. I chose old." —Former soldier

item.text: Until end of turn, you may tap lands you don't control for mana. Spend this mana only to cast spells.
item.flavorText: The sea gives, and the sea takes. Some just help with the taking.

item.flavorText: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

item.name: Raiding Nightstalker
item.text: Swampwalk
item.flavorText: "Our steeds need food, water, stabling. Theirs just need prey." —Restela, Alaborn marshal

item.name: Rain of Daggers
item.text: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. You lose 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.
item.flavorText: Knives in the sky, cries in the air, and blood on the ground.

item.name: Raise Dead
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: "Life from death is part of the natural cycle. This is merely a shortcut." —Tojira, swamp queen

item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: "Life from death is part of the natural cycle. This is merely a shortcut." —Tojira, swamp queen

item.text: Cast Rally the Troops only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Untap all creatures you control.

item.text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

item.name: Razorclaw Bear
item.text: Whenever Razorclaw Bear becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: One razorclaw is three bears too many. —Elvish saying

item.name: Relentless Assault
item.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

item.name: Remove
item.text: Cast Remove only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Return target attacking creature to its owner's hand.

item.name: Renewing Touch
item.text: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.
item.flavorText: Death just encourages life the more.

item.name: Return of the Nightstalkers
item.text: Return all Nightstalker permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Then destroy all Swamps you control.

item.name: Righteous Charge
item.text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Bravery shines brightest in a pure soul." —Restela, Alaborn marshal

item.name: Righteous Fury
item.text: Destroy all tapped creatures. You gain 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

item.name: River Bear
item.text: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls an Island.)
item.flavorText: The bears had been isolated on an island for hundreds of years, until the island sank and the bears didn't.

item.name: Salvage
item.text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
item.flavorText: "What was taken shall be restored." —Arathel, elvish queen

item.name: Screeching Drake
item.text: Flying When Screeching Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

item.name: Sea Drake
item.text: Flying When Sea Drake enters the battlefield, return two target lands you control to their owner's hand.

item.name: Sleight of Hand
item.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

item.text: Spitting Earth deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature.

item.text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
item.flavorText: "You idiots Turn it around Turn it around"

item.text: Steam Frigate can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
item.flavorText: "Is it merchants or is it pirates?" "It's Talas—there's no difference."

item.flavorText: The deeper the wood, the greater its strength.

item.name: Talas Air Ship
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "Their ships pollute our air as they themselves pollute our forest." —Arathel, elvish queen

item.name: Talas Explorer
item.text: Flying When Talas Explorer enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

item.name: Talas Merchant
item.flavorText: The trader let loose a laugh that made all around him check their purses.

item.name: Talas Researcher
item.text: {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
item.flavorText: From time, knowledge. From knowledge, power.

item.name: Talas Scout
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "Scouting a battle before you fight it is just good business." —Jefan, Talas ship captain

item.name: Talas Warrior
item.text: Talas Warrior is unblockable.
item.flavorText: The sea is in their blood. Literally.

item.name: Temple Acolyte
item.text: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
item.flavorText: Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.

item.name: Temple Elder
item.text: {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
item.flavorText: "Give us breath. Give us life. Prepare us for the day we make." —The Alaborn "Rite of Battle"

item.name: Temporal Manipulation
item.text: Take an extra turn after this one.
item.flavorText: Doing something at the last minute isn't so bad when you can make that minute last.

item.name: Theft of Dreams
item.text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
item.flavorText: "First they fight, then they sleep, then they dream. And finally I receive my reward."

item.name: Theft of Dreams
item.text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
item.flavorText: "First they fight, then they sleep, then they dream. And finally I receive my reward."

item.name: Tidal Surge
item.text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
item.flavorText: Four little goblins, trapped by the sea. One teased a serpent, and then there were three.

item.name: Tidal Surge
item.text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
item.flavorText: Four little goblins, trapped by the sea. One teased a serpent, and then there were three.

item.name: Time Ebb
item.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
item.flavorText: "The ogre had come from out of the blue, so that's where I sent it back." —Talas wizard

item.name: Time Ebb
item.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
item.flavorText: "The ogre had come from out of the blue, so that's where I sent it back." —Talas wizard

item.name: Touch of Brilliance
item.text: Draw two cards.
item.flavorText: "I don't want what I don't have. I want more of what I do have."

item.name: Touch of Brilliance
item.text: Draw two cards.
item.flavorText: "I don't want what I don't have. I want more of what I do have."

item.name: Town Sentry
item.text: Whenever Town Sentry blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "So he gots a sword. Big deal." "Yeah, it's a big deal—it's a big sword" —Two goblins outside the gates of Trokin

item.name: Tree Monkey
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: "They serve the world best on a platter with shallots and onions." —Talas sailor

item.name: Tremor
item.text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
item.flavorText: One little goblin shook up the ground. When the dust cleared, no one was found.

item.name: Trokin High Guard
item.flavorText: Battle tempers soldiers as fire tempers steel.

item.name: Undo
item.text: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

item.name: Untamed Wilds
item.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Untamed Wilds
item.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Vampiric Spirit
item.text: Flying When Vampiric Spirit enters the battlefield, you lose 4 life.

item.name: Vengeance
item.text: Destroy target tapped creature.
item.flavorText: A bullet renders all sizes equal.

item.name: Vengeance
item.text: Destroy target tapped creature.
item.flavorText: A bullet renders all sizes equal.

item.name: Volcanic Hammer
item.text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

item.name: Volcanic Hammer
item.text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

item.name: Volunteer Militia
item.flavorText: People fight hardest on their own soil.

item.name: Warrior's Stand
item.text: Cast Warrior's Stand only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.name: Wild Griffin
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.

item.name: Wild Ox
item.text: Swampwalk
item.flavorText: It has the run of the swamps, and it knows it.

item.name: Wildfire
item.text: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.

item.name: Wind Sail
item.text: One or two target creatures gain flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: It pays to be at home both on the sea and in the sky.
